TRY_SECTION_TEXT: Vlasni applies predictive algorithms for matching users interests and advertising offers.
BEHIND_SECTION_TITLE: Created by Develance and supported by Peypedatos
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT: Vlasni applies predictives algorithms for matching user interests and advertising offers
HOW_IT_WORKS_CAMPAIGNS_TITLE: Vlasni is proactive, it does not require the individual to perform any activity in order to deliver advertising.
HOW_IT_WORKS_CAMPAIGNS_REGISTRATION_TEXT: Users downloads the mobile application, self register in a single step, and that's it.
HOW_IT_WORKS_CAMPAIGNS_NOTIFICATION_TEXT: It alerts the individuals when an offer is activated, based on the calendar, geo-positioning, and other factors
HOW_IT_WORKS_CAMPAIGNS_INTERACTION_TEXT: Interactive contents offer a communication channel 1-on-1 between Advertiser and Individual.
HOW_IT_WORKS_QUOTE: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco.
HOW_IT_WORKS_STEPS_TEXT_1: History of consumption and interest matrix combined with the individual's behavor and bids generated by the advertiser.
HOW_IT_WORKS_STEPS_TEXT_2: Autonomous artificial intelligence algorithms predict the most likely match between available offers and interests of individuals.
HOW_IT_WORKS_STEPS_TEXT_3: The results are organized obtaining individualized advertising campaigns, avoiding content that has no correspondence with the recipient.
PRICING_TEXT: Vlasni applies predictives algorithms for matching user interests and advertising offers
PRICING_CAMPAIGNS_TEXT: The platform to manage personalized advertising campaigns, with individuals deliveries, noninvasive
PRICING_NOTIFICATIONS_TEXT: The platform to manage personalized advertising campaigns, with individuals deliveries, noninvasive
QUICK_VIEW_TEXT: Vlasni applies predictives algorithms for matching user interests and advertising offers
QUICK_VIEW_TOOLS_TITLE: Advertisers have access to a complete tool for managing the service and to a mobile application for the end user -with a minimalist design- aimed at all audiences.
QUICK_VIEW_DASHBOARD_TEXT: All relevant information in one place
QUICK_VIEW_SHOPCART_TEXT: Service packages purchase can be fully managed fromt within the administrative tool
QUICK_VIEW_OFFERS_TEXT: A complete tool to manage advertising campaigns.
QUICK_VIEW_SIGNUP_TEXT: Easy and fast download and sign-up.
QUICK_VIEW_NOTIFICATIONS_TEXT: Advertising alerts are based on geo positioning, dates and time, events, weather.
QUICK_VIEW_INTERACTIVE_TEXT: Contesnts are as dynamic as advertiser choose
